ygData.subject: Re: others
ygData.msgSnippet: Blaze looked back toward Silver Scout, They know we re here. she smelled the gas, I could reopen the doors but we don t know what s on the other side. she

Blaze looked back toward Silver Scout, "They know we're here." she smelled
the gas, "I could reopen the doors but we don't know what's on the other
side." she thought fast. "Well Shivah let's play for a while." useing her
advanced computer knowledge she accessed the gas control and shut off the
valve to the room, and sent a false signal that the gas was still running.
"Lets see how you like it." typeing in more codes she opened a valve near
the terminal where Kali was. Again she turned to Silver Scout. "Lay down and
close your eyes." Transforming to tigress she layed down and did the same.

"Oh I see." Silver Scout replied, "Join the Predacons, learn to play dead."
she lay down on her side near the far wall and closed her eyes as she was
instructed.
----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 06, 2001 10:56 PM
Subject: Re: others


> sHIVAH/KALI/lUZBEL/aTTILLA:::
>
> Shivah noticed that someone was playing with the controls and  he
> typed some buttons inorder to stop Razorclaw and Ender before they
> could escape. Next he send a commands to his brothers  in order to
> stop Razorcraws and Ender.
>
> Kali typed some buttons and two wall slided in each side of the
> corritor where Silver Scout and Blaze were. Next the femme, pushed a
> button and a gas started to araise where Silverscout and Blaze were,
> that gas would made them sleep a large time.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Blaze and Silver Scout continued wandering back toward Shivahs
> location when Silver Scout picked up a scent. "Foxfingers?" the scent
> was strong, like he was close. "Kit Kat and Drillbit were with him,
> he's in trouble."
> >
> > The tigress travelling with the wolf transformed to get a better
> whif of what the mutant was smelling. "He's caught, there's nothing
> we can do." she had given up hope of escape. By now her computer
> access was probably cut off.
> >
> > "We have to save him, I owe my creator that much." the wolf started
> off in the direction but was quickly stopped.
> >
> > "Then fine, you won't die alone." Even without her computer access
> she could still help, if she couldn't hack the computer then she
> wasn't worth the function her motherboard was printed on. "I'll see
> what I can do." the tigress transformed back to her bot mode. The
> virus was taking effect eact time she transformed back she could feel
> it impedeing her transformation. Quickly accessing a computer
> terminal she learned that Razor Claw and Ender were still
> trapped. "Let's see if I can't cause a little confusion around here."
> soon after the door opened giveing the two bots an escape route.
>
